# Security Documentation

This directory contains detailed security documentation for the repository.

### [SETUP_INSTRUCTIONS.md](SETUP_INSTRUCTIONS.md)

Complete step-by-step guide for configuring all security features in GitHub UI. Includes branch protection, environment setup, secrets management, and testing procedures.

**Read this when:** Setting up the repository for the first time or enabling security features.

### [SECURITY_QUICK_REFERENCE.md](SECURITY_QUICK_REFERENCE.md)

One-page quick reference guide for daily development tasks. Includes pre-commit checklists, common security issues, and quick fixes.

**Read this when:** Daily development work, creating releases, or handling security alerts.

### [SECURITY_CONFIG.md](SECURITY_CONFIG.md)

Technical reference document with detailed configuration settings for all security features including branch protection rules, permissions, scanning tools, and compliance standards.

**Read this when:** Need detailed technical configuration information or troubleshooting specific security features.
